Body:
params = TestParams()
adjustment = {'min_int_param': [{'label0': 'zero', 'label1': 1, 'value':
    'not a number'}, {'label0': 'one', 'label1': 2, 'value':
    'still not a number'}], 'date_param': [{'label0': 'zero', 'label1': 1,
    'value': 'not a date'}]}
params.adjust(adjustment, raise_errors=False)
exp = {'min_int_param': ['Not a valid integer: not a number.',
    'Not a valid integer: still not a number.'], 'date_param': [
    'Not a valid date: not a date.']}
assert params.errors == exp
